de.mrapp.android.util.view

Class HeaderAndFooterRecyclerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.ViewGroup
      • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView
        • de.mrapp.android.util.view.HeaderAndFooterRecyclerView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.view.NestedScrollingChild, android.support.v4.view.ScrollingView

    public class HeaderAndFooterRecyclerView
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView
    A recycler view, which can contain multiple fixed views as headers and footers.
    Since:
    1.12.0

    • Method Detail

      • addHeaderView

        public final void addHeaderView(@NonNull
                                View view)
        Adds a fixed view to appear at the top of the grid view. If this method is called more than once, the views will appear in the order they were added.
        Parameters:
        view - The header view, which should be added, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • removeHeaderView

        public final void removeHeaderView(@NonNull
                                   View view)
        Removes a previously added header view.
        Parameters:
        view - The header view, which should be removed, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • getHeaderViewsCount

        public final int getHeaderViewsCount()
        Returns the number of header views in the grid view.
        Returns:
        The number of header views as an Integer value

      • addFooterView

        public final void addFooterView(@NonNull
                                View view)
        Adds a fixed view to appear at the bottom of the grid view. If this method is called more than once, the views will appear in the order they were added.
        Parameters:
        view - The footer view, which should be added, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • removeFooterView

        public final void removeFooterView(@NonNull
                                   View view)
        Removes a previously added footer view.
        Parameters:
        view - The footer view, which should be removed, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • getFooterViewsCount

        public final int getFooterViewsCount()
        Returns the number of footer views in the grid view.
        Returns:
        The number of footer views as an Integer value
